“It was a pleasure to work with Trydus Co. Not only the experts helped me to get the products I wanted but also they showed me how we can promote those products using their own channel! That is really something else. Thank you!”

Gretchen Torff
Head of Marketing

“After being forced to move twice within five years, our customers had a hard time finding us and our sales plummeted. The Trydus Co. not only revitalized our brand, but saved our nearly 100-year-old family business from the brink of ruin.”

Roger Kenter
Head of Marketing
